name: Foosball Arcade 3D World Tour
description:
Foosball Arcade 3D World Tour

Stylish, realistic and speedy arcade foosball game.


An arcade 3d foosball game like real football game.

Play with your friends or the CPU 

Be the champion among all nations! 

Compete with friends in the challenging Versus mode.

Features:

- 3D graphics.

- All you need to do is Swipe.

- Versus mode - you can play with your friends using one device.

- Adjustable time limit and the number of goals.

- Items that can change game phase.

- Variety of international teams.

- Player formation selection.

- Play with your friends or the CPU.

- Smart Artificial Intelligence.

- Tournament play. 

- Arcade, Casual, Football, Soccer, Minigames, Multiplayer, Singleplayer.
